(row = 13, col = 1)
=== Last Position ===
(row = 13, col = 1)

Given that the avatar's position has not changed from the last state, I need to make a different move. The avatar is currently located at (row = 13, col = 1), which is clear and surrounded mostly by unoccupied spaces and an entrance monster at (row = 13, col = 25). 

My strategy is to collect the gems situated above at (row = 1, col = 1) to (row = 1, col = 10). To quickly initiate movement, I will try to move **up** into row 12 which is open and will allow subsequent movements. 

``` Action:4 ``` 

This action should position my avatar closer to begin navigating towards the area with gems. I expect to find more opportunities to collect items in the next turn.
